issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description: In PCPP, currently we are using {{getMaxAMResourcePerQueuePercent()}} to get the max AM capacity for queue to save AM Containers from preemption. As we are now supporting MaxAMResourcePerQueuePercent per partition, PCPP also need to handle the same.
fields.summary: ProportionalPreemptionPolicy needs to handle AMResourcePercentage per partition

comments.body:
Attaching an initial version of the patch. I will add one more test case with label and AM container preemption in short while.
cc/[~leftnoteasy]

| (x) *{color:red}-1 overall{color}* |
